name: @nodejs/chalk-to-util-styletext
description: Migrate from the chalk package to Node.js's built-in util.styleText API

scripts.test: npm run test:workflow && npm run test:remove-dependencies
scripts.test:remove-dependencies: npx codemod jssg test -l json ./src/remove-dependencies.ts ./tests/remove-dependencies --allow-child-process --allow-fs --strictness cst

author: Richie McColl
